TopicTitle: Concerning The Disappearance Of "The Next Frontier"

Articles.Content:
Just so everyone's aware of the fact, the moderators have decided to remove The Next Frontier from this site because it contains content that's not suitable for an all-ages forum like this one. I'm not going to pretend I'm happy about this, but I have had a perfectly civil discussion with Master Tao on the issue and I can't really argue with the reasoning behind the decision. I have also not been subjected to any official sanction for -let's face it- not so much bending board rules as tying them in knots, despite the fact they have ample grounds for slapping me with a lengthy ban according to a strict interpretation of forum policy, so please let's not have any board drama over this issue.

I can't link to the thread directly, but if you want to re-read the story and follow the as-yet untitled sequel, please come find me at one of the following forums:

Spacebattles

Sufficient Velocity

Stardestroyer.net

At some point there'll also be a PDF or other ebook edition, but that's a long-term project.

Thanks to everyone for their advice, support and encouragement throughout the writing process of this story; it means an awful lot to me. Hope to see you all elsewhere on the internet.
Shame. Such a shame. I'll look for you, probably on "spacebattles", 'cause that sounds neat.
Thanks. Be warned, though, SpaceBattles in particular is a rather rowdy neighbourhood compared to this place.
I got'cha. Just signed up as, yes, "Jayne Cobb".
Can you give me a rough outline of said unsuitable content?
Probably not a great idea, since it concerns moderator decisions on this forum, although I understand it was all amicable.

Can you give me a rough outline of said unsuitable content?

Strong language, some rather off-colour jokes and a large amount of on-page violence near the climax. And I would again like to emphasise that Tao Master and I had a perfectly civil discussion on the subject and I bear the moderators no ill-will, so I don't want to hear about people yelling at them for just doing their jobs.
